title: ACA Repeal Fails in the Senate as McConnells Moves On (Audio)
itunes:title: ACA Repeal Fails in the Senate as McConnells Moves On (Audio)
description:
(Bloomberg) -- Laura Litvan, a Bloomberg News Congressional reporter, discusses the Senate's failed attempts to repeal the Affordable Care Act. She speaks with June Grasso and Michael Best on Bloomberg Radio's "Bloomberg Law."

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
